#summary The script used to profile SETI@Home

= This script was used to profile SETI at home on x86 (Nehalem) =

{{{
#!/bin/bash
SleepSeconds=5

./seti_boinc --standalone &
date
sudo opcontrol --init
sudo opcontrol --no-vmlinux
sudo opcontrol --reset
sudo opcontrol --event=CPU_CLK_UNHALTED:6000:0x41:0:1
sudo opcontrol --start
sudo opcontrol --status
sleep $SleepSeconds
sudo opcontrol --dump
sudo opreport << Nehalem_CPU_CLK_UNHALTED.txt
echo " "

# Running next event 
date
sudo opcontrol --reset
sudo opcontrol --event=INST_RETIRED:6000:0x41:0:1
sudo opcontrol --start
sudo opcontrol --status
sleep $SleepSeconds
sudo opcontrol --dump
sudo opreport << Nehalem_INST_RETIRED.txt


# Running next event 
date
sudo opcontrol --reset
sudo opcontrol --event=LLC_MISSES:6000:0x41:0:1
sudo opcontrol --start
sudo opcontrol --status
sleep $SleepSeconds
sudo opcontrol --dump
sudo opreport << Nehalem_LLC_MISSES.txt


# Running next event 
date
sudo opcontrol --reset
sudo opcontrol --event=BR_INST_RETIRED:6000:0x41:0:1
sudo opcontrol --start
sudo opcontrol --status
sleep $SleepSeconds
sudo opcontrol --dump
sudo opreport << Nehalem_BR_INST_RETIRED.txt



# Running next event 
date
sudo opcontrol --reset
sudo opcontrol --event=BR_MISS_PRED_RETIRED:6000:0x41:0:1
sudo opcontrol --start
sudo opcontrol --status
sleep $SleepSeconds
sudo opcontrol --dump
sudo opreport << Nehalem_BR_MISS_PRED_RETIRED.txt

}}}
